roleset.name: build up

example.name: the one example
example.text: Federal examiner Alex Barabolak said [Lincoln's operations]-1 amounted to ``*trace*-1 pyramiding debt to provide a luxurious life style for its owners.''
example.arg: to provide a luxurious life style for its owners.''

roleset.note: PYRAMID-V NOTES: Could potentially take other args from 'build' such as material,start/end states, but examples are wanting. (from pyramid.01-v)
